title: Corruption in the civilization of Ixtal

embed.description: Gyazo is a simple way to share screenshots, GIFs, and replays in seconds. Take interesting and useful captures from games, apps, and sites instantly.

replies.body: He gained the privilege to be executed by her so it's a win.
I dont think Ixtal has some secret corruption. if anything Qiyana HERSELF is the corruption. she obviously wants a more brutal rulership than those of the past
I am fairly sure a people consider Tyrants to be a corrupt type of rulers, they are certainly not pure&virtuous.
I don't think she got affected by something, she is simply that way.

Qiyana aims to be the queen, she isn't the ruler yet though.

And overall Ixtal has to deal with Piltover and Noxus trying to get their resources, so I dunno if they really need some secretly corrupt history, when they already have some interesting problems on their own.
